snp3.4:0.2: With Bh훮radv훮ja of Sundarika on the Sacrificial Cake
snp3.4:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Kosalan lands on the bank of the Sundarika river.
snp3.4:1.3: Now at that time the brahmin Bh훮radv훮ja of Sundarika was serving the sacred flame and performing the fire sacrifice on the bank of the river Sundarika.
